Meeting Cost Calculator by Ramp: Understand the Real Value of Your Meetings

Unlock insights into the true value of your meetings with Ramp's Meeting Cost Calculator extension. In a world where time equals money, Ramp is here to help you optimize both.

Don't let costly meetings drain your company's resources. Equip yourself with the insights to optimize your time and make meetings more productive.

üöÄ Features
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Time-to-Cost Analysis: Instantly see the estimated cost of each meeting based on attendees and their time value.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Streamlined Interface: Seamlessly integrates with your Google calendar for a clutter-free experience.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Informed Decision Making: Equip yourself with the knowledge to prioritize and evaluate each meeting's ROI with tangible cost comparisons.
  
üöÄ How It Works
  ‚≠êÔ∏è The extension evaluates meeting attendees and their estimated hourly rate.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è It computes the combined cost, helping you make data-driven decisions about meeting value.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Note: Ramp respects your data security and privacy. Your meeting information and sensitive information isn't stored on our servers, all of the calculations run locally in your browser.

üöÄ Optimize Beyond Meetings
Ramp's suite of tools are designed to help businesses manage and optimize their finances. From the Calendar Cost extension, discover how Ramp can guide your business to financial fitness.

Feedback & Support
Your experience matters. Have questions, suggestions, or need help? Reach out to us at meetingcostsupport@ramp.com.
